name: GIF Viewer
short_description:
GIF Viewer is a very simple yet very useful application that will help you open Graphics Interchange Format bitmaps quick and easy on any Windows machine out there.

Windows 7 users will definitely find it a life-saving tool because, as many of you already know, the operating system doesn't come with a built-in GIF viewer, which means this particular format is only handled by Internet Explorer.

As a result, opening a simple GIF file needs more computer resources that you'd be tempted to believe, so GIF Viewer is indeed a handy utility.

The interface is very simple and that's exactly how it was supposed to be. But besides the fact that it's able to open GIF files, the application also comprises some other goodies, including a dedicated tool to convert those image files to other formats such as PNG, JPG and TIF.
summary: An intuitive and efficient GIF solution
